A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Easily the second best Star Wars behind The Empire Strikes Back. The character development was at an all-time best in this film. Each story arc was interesting and kept you on the edge of your set. The humor seemed off in a few places\, but still got a chuckle from the audience. This film doesn't rely on a huge amount of action or exposition like The Force Awakens did\, and unfortunately\, folks are going into the Last Jedi expecting that again; it simply isn't so. This one contains numerous nuances that might require a second viewing to catch. Visually\, this film is gorgeous\, and\, as I see it\, the most visually pleasing and beautiful film in the saga. Don't allow the negative\, simple minded reviews steer you from this masterpiece of a film.
